parameters.name: EndpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the traffic policy to be queried.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The operation that you want to perform. Set the value to **DescribeCustomRoutingEndPointTrafficPolicy**.
